00005         class TestOfMatchers extends UnitTestCase {
00006                 public function testRegexMatcherShouldMatchPatternAndReturnLengthOfMatch() {
00007                         $matcher = new RegexMatcher('[0-9]+');
00008                         $this->assertIdentical($matcher->matches('1234a', $value), 4);
00009                         $this->assertIdentical($value, '1234');
00010                 }
00011                 
00012                 public function testRegexMatcherShouldReturnFalseOnNoMatch() {
00013                         $matcher = new RegexMatcher('[0-9]+');
00014                         $this->assertFalse($matcher->matches('abc123', $value));
00015                 }
00016                 
00017                 public function testParallelMatcherShouldMatchLongerStringOnColision() {
00018                         $matcher = new ParallelMatcher;
00019                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('true'));
00020                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('.+'));
00021                         $this->assertEqual($matcher->matches('truestring', $value), 10);
00022                         $this->assertEqual($value, 'truestring');
00023                 }
00024                 
00025                 public function testSerialMatcherShouldMatchAllParts() {
00026                         $matcher = new SerialMatcher;
00027                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('[a-zA-Z0-9_]+'));
00028                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('='));
00029                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('[0-9]+'));
00030                         $this->assertEqual($matcher->matches('key=20', $value), 6);
00031                         $this->assertEqual($value, 'key=20');
00032                 }
00033                 
00034                 public function testSerialMatcherShouldFailIfAnyPartDoesNotMatch() {
00035                         $matcher = new SerialMatcher;
00036                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('[a-zA-Z0-9_]+'));
00037                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('='));
00038                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('[0-9]+'));
00039                         $this->assertFalse($matcher->matches('key=a20', $value));
00040                 }
00041                 
00042                 public function testSimpleSerialMatcherShouldReturnRequestedPartOnMatch() {
00043                         $matcher = new SimpleSerialMatcher(1);
00044                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('\('));
00045                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('[0-9]+'));
00046                         $matcher->add(new RegexMatcher('\)'));
00047                         $this->assertEqual($matcher->matches('(1234)', $value), 6);
00048                         $this->assertEqual($value, '1234');
00049                 }
00050         }

00057         class TestOfAnnotationMatchers extends UnitTestCase {
00058                 public function testAnnotationsMatcherShouldMatchAnnotationWithGarbage() {
00059                         $expected = array('Annotation' => array(
00060                                 array('value' => true),
00061                         ));
00062                         $matcher = new AnnotationsMatcher;
00063                         $this->assertMatcherResult($matcher, '@', $expected);
00064                 }
00065                 
00066                 public function testAnnotationsMatcherShouldNotMatchEmail() {
00067                         $matcher = new AnnotationsMatcher;
00068                         $this->assertMatcherResult($matcher, 'johno@example.com', array());
00069                 }

00071                 public function testAnnotationsMatcherShouldMatchMultipleAnnotations() {
00072                         $expected = array('Annotation' => array(
00073                                 array('value' => true),
00074                                 array('value' => false)
00075                         ));
00076                         $matcher = new AnnotationsMatcher;
00077                         $this->assertMatcherResult($matcher, ' ss @Annotation(true) @Annotation(false)', $expected);
00078                 }

00086                                 @Annotation(true) 
00087                                 @Annotation(false)

00089                         $matcher = new AnnotationsMatcher;
00090                         $this->assertMatcherResult($matcher, $block, $expected);

00339                 private function assertNotFalse($value) {
00340                         $this->assertNotIdentical($value, false);
00341                 }
00342                 
00343                 private function assertMatcherResult($matcher, $string, $expected) {
00344                         $this->assertNotIdentical($matcher->matches($string, $value), false);
00345                         $this->assertIdentical($value, $expected);
00346                 }
